special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: . The hook horror can't use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: . The hook horror has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

special_abilities.name: Hook
special_abilities.desc: . Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: . The hook horror makes two hook attacks.

name: Hook Horror
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 10 ft., passive Perception 13
